snippet: Dion Waiters scored 20 points as top-ranked Syracuse beat Villanova, 79-66. The Orange are 18-0 for the second straight season.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Syracuse remains undefeated with a 79-66 win over Villanova; other men's and women's college basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Dion Waiters scored 20 points as top-ranked Syracuse beat Villanova, 79-66. The Orange are 18-0 for the second straight season.

headline.seo: No. 1 Syracuse Beats Villanova, Goes to 18-0
headline.main: Syracuse Goes to 18-0; Kentucky Wins With Big Finish
headline.print_headline: Syracuse Goes to 18-0; Kentucky Wins With Big Finish
